interactivity.requirements: Not Wednesday 15 Kirin Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Enigmatology " from Kirin Kanda
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit Kirin at the School Dorms after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

progression.synopsis: Kirin and Noriko are about to watch a "super-weird" movie featuring an upside-down house, and they invite Sensei to join them. Noriko vetoes anything that might make a mess under her nice new kotatsu, and is jealous of Kirin sitting next to Sensei. As they try to interpret the strange movie, Kirin gets bored and starts to play with Sensei under the table. Noriko figures it out and puts a stop to it.
trivia: On Kirin's whiteboard is a message in hexadecimal. When decoded, it's revealed to be a excerpt from William Blake's "Proverbs of Hell". The decoded message can be found below: "74 68 65 68 6f 75 72 73 6f 66 66 6f 6c 6c 79 61 72 65 6d 65 61 73 75 72 65 64 62 79 74 68 65 63 6c 6f 63 6b" - The hours of folly are measured by the clock
"74 68 65 68 6f 75 72 73 6f 66 66 6f 6c 6c 79 61 72 65 6d 65 61 73 75 72 65 64 62 79 74 68 65 63 6c 6f 63 6b" - The hours of folly are measured by the clock

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.14.
